item.title: SCANIA T v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
SCANIA T v1.0 ETS2

5 Cabins: Small, Long, Sleeper with windows variants
6 Chassis with 3 Tandems, Carrier and Dump
7 interiors with color variants
Few skins
A lot of truck customizations/parts
Interior and exterior tunings addon and more



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: PACK DE REBOQUES LS v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
PACK DE REBOQUES LS v1.0 ETS2

– Container trailer
– Refrigerated trailer
– Curtain trailer
– Food Tank trailer
– Container trailer has a configuration for use with our SpecTransGroup
– Each trailer has different skins
– Completely created from the scratch high quality 3D models and textures
– Unique mod elements and many other options
– Each trailer has a wide range of customization options
– Each trailer is avalible as your own trailer in game (ownable)
– Each trailer have high-quality animated air/electricity cables
– Full Standalone
– Wheels pack included
– Lots of License Plates
Updated for game version 1.49, 1.50-1.51.x, 1.52-1.53



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: SFIGC Map v0.6.1 1.52 ETS2
item.description:
SFIGC Map v0.6.1 1.52 ETS2

Features of this mod:

Cities:
Grutness – Shetlands
Lerwick – Shetlands
Sandness – Shetlands
Brae – Shetlands
Toft – Shetlands
Ulsta – Shetlands
Mid-Yell – Shetlands
Gloup – Shetlands
Gutcher – Shetlands

Skopun – Faroe Islands
Sandvik – Faroe Islands
Trongisvágur – Faroe Islands
Hvalba – Faroe Islands
Húsavík – Faroe Islands
Froðba – Faroe Islands
Porkeri – Faroe Islands
Vágur – Faroe Islands
Lopra – Faroe Islands
Sumba – Faroe Islands

Iqaluit – Canada
Apex – Canada

Nanortalik – Greenland
Tasiusaq – Greenland
Tasiilaq – Greenland
Kulusuk – Greenland
Kuumiit – Greenland
Ittoqqortoormiit – Greenland

Promods is required



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Southern Region & Donbass Map & RusMap Road Connection v152.0 ETS2
item.description:
Southern Region & Donbass Map & RusMap Road Connection v152.0 ETS2

Southern Region – Donbass Map – RusMap Road Connection

Updates and Features:
New Roads:
Belgorod to Kharkiv
Lugansk to Pavlovsk

New Ferries:
Mariupol
Yeysk

Fixes:
Service station in Mariupol has been repaired and updated.

Enhance your trucking routes with these expanded road networks and ferry options!



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
